alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 9:54PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of , the City of Norfolk, the City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth and the City of Virginia Beach through 1045 PM EDT... At 954 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Churchland to near Deep Creek to 7 miles west of Northwest. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virginia Beach, Ocean View, Kempsville, Virginia Wesleyan University, Old Dominion University, Downtown Norfolk, Regent University, Great Bridge, Deep Creek, Downtown Portsmouth, Churchland, Norfolk State University, Norfolk, Chesapeake, Portsmouth, Fentress, Bowers Hill, Cradock, Princess Anne and Back Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
